description: TeeChart charts may be exported to a variety of image and data formats, including JPEG, BMP, PNG, GIF, XML, HTML, Excel, and PDF. The TEE file is saved in a a proprietary TeeChart format and is primarily used for sharing settings of a chart that you want to apply to other charts. You can view the settings of a chart when the TEE file is open and selecting Plot â†’ Chart Settings for Active Plot .
NOTE: TeeChart is available for VCL/FMX, .NET, Java, PHP AX, and HTML5 software.
